function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty in quanta generation rate for airborne infection.","Impact":"Overestimation of likelihood of airborne infection in moderate to high infection risk scenarios.","Mitigation":"Conducting more accurate studies to determine appropriate values for quanta generation rate.","Technologies":"Advanced airflow measurement technologies to accurately quantify quanta generation rate.","People":"Occupants of built environments at moderate to high infection risk.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies, and building management."},{"Description":"Inaccurate assessment of infection risk due to low activity levels and inappropriate quanta generation rate.","Impact":"Potential for underestimating airborne infection risk in typical scenarios with low activity levels.","Mitigation":"Using accurate quanta generation rate values specific to the activity level and infection type.","Technologies":"High-resolution sensors to measure activity levels and improve quanta generation rate estimation.","People":"Occupants of built environments with low activity levels.","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance personnel, and public health agencies."},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation rate leading to increased likelihood of airborne infection.","Impact":"Higher risk of airborne infection due to insufficient ventilation rates.","Mitigation":"Increasing ventilation rates to improve air quality and reduce the likelihood of airborne infection.","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation systems, air purifiers, and natural ventilation methods.","People":"Occupants of environments with inadequate ventilation rates.","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance personnel, and public health agencies."}]}
